tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_beach: Who doesn't like a nice day at the beach? No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_mushroom: A fun place for a fungi. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_flooded: Not actually flooded, false advertizing. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_fairy_ring: Lovely and charming. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_shipwreck: Don't become a castaway yourself. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_haunted: What's so haunted about it? No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_sea_floor: The seaweed is always greener. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_undersea: Down where it's wetter! All but special rooms are filled with water.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_poison: Rotten to the core. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_ice: Brr, icey and snowy and polar bears that bite? No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_ice_cave: Brr, icey and snowy and polar bears that bite? Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_cave: A cave, what more can I say. Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_cave_deepslate: A deepslate cave, what more can I say. Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_cave_geode: A cave in lovely purple. Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_cave_wasteland: Can a cave be a waste? Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_lush_cave: A lovely lush interior. Can contain Diamond and Larimar Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_nether_crimson: A dangerous scorching environment. Contains more unique gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_nether_warped: A dangerous but beautiful environment. Contains more unique gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_nether_blackston: A dangerous and dark environment. Contains more unique gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_nether_soul: A dangerous and dark environment. Contains more unique gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_desert: Rough, coarse, and it gets everywhere. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_sweet: Gummy bears galore! Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_festive: Tis' the season! Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_gingerbread: Delicious gingerbread! Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_easter_egg: Is the Easter Bunny real? Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_easter_pastel: Is the Easter Bunny real? Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_white: Eat your heart out, bastard. Chests have festive textures.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_sandy_cave: A cave, but sandy! Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_tropical: A coveted get-away with special tropical mobs. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_dark_cavern: A dark, fearsome, and dreary home to lethal foes. Contains more black opal and painite and can contain special Benitoite and Painite caves. Special rooms are more common.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_mesa: You could say it is a-mesa-ing. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_deep_mesa: You could say it is deeply a-mesa-ing. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_blood_moon: Try to keep your blood inside you. Contains more black opal and painite.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_flesh: Disgusting. Contains more black opal and painite.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_blood: Contains more black opal and painite.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_blood_ash: Contains more black opal and painite.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_season_spring: Bright and cheery. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_season_fall: A lovely season. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_season_summer: The worst season. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_season_winter: Lovely and chilly. No special attributes.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_aurora_cave: A dazzling cave. Can contain Chromatic Iron Caves.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_chaos: Everything is out of sorts. All chests and rooms are randomized.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_wendarr_normal: A god's domain. Contains only Wendarr God Altars.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_tenos_normal: A god's domain. Contains only Tenos God Altars.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_velara_normal: A god's domain. Contains only Velara God Altars.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_idona_normal: A god's domain. Contains only Idona God Altars, contains more unique gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_void: Dark and foreboding, watch your step! Contains more echo and black opal gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_factory_void: Dark and foreboding and vividly green, watch your step! Contains more echo and black opal gems.
tooltips.the_vault:classic_vault_end_void: Dark and foreboding, home of endermen. Contains more echo and black opal gems.
